person.content:

Paragraph: The Barbarians included 14 internationals but , with only two pre-match practice sessions behind them , proved no real match for a Wallaby side determined to finish their 12-match tour unbeaten .

|--------|

| 14 internationals (unspecified names) |
| a Wallaby side |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| The Barbarians |
| a Wallaby side |

These are the valid entities identified in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Person". The "14 internationals" are not considered a distinct entity from "The Barbarians" since they are just a part of the team named "The Barbarians". Therefore, only "The Barbarians" and "a Wallaby side" are presented as valid entities.
